name: Primary Stats
description: The primary stats of a character are the base stat from which all other stats are derived from and affect all manner of things in combat.

name: Offensive Stats
description: Offensive stats are extra modifiers that can affect damage and threat generation of actions.

name: Damage Modifiers
description: Damage modifiers increase the amount of damage the character deals with a certain element by the specified amount as long as that element's damage for an action is greater than 0.

name: Armor Values
description: Armor values directly deduct the amount of incoming damage by the specified amount. If the armor is greater than incoming damage, the character receives no damage.

name: Damage Percentage Modifiers
description: Damage percentage modifiers increases the amount of damage a character does with a certain element by a percentage as long as that element's damage for an action is greater than 0.

name: Resistances
description: Resistances decrease the amount of damage a character receives from an element by a percentage. If a specific resistance is 100%, a character receives no damage from that element. If resistance is greater than 100%, a character heals from that element.

name: Strength
description: Strength is the measure of a character's physical power. Every point of strength increases Physical damage modifier by 1.

name: Stamina
description: Stamina is the measure of a character's toughness. Each point of stamina increases the character's hit points by 15.

name: Intellect
description: Intellect is the measure of a character's mental acuity. Each point of intellect increases the character's mana by 10.

name: Agility
description: Agility is the measure of a character's dextrous wiles. Each point of agility increases critical damage by 1% and every 5 points of agility increases critical chance by 1%.

name: Speed
description: Speed is the measure of a character's physical and mental quickness. The higher a character's speed, the sooner the character will perform it's actions at the start of a round.

name: Critical Chance
description: Critical chance is the percentage chance that a character will perform a critical hit with an action, increasing the action's damage and healing by the critical damage amount.

name: Critical Damage
description: Critical damage is the percentage increase in damage and healing that a character will deal with an action in the case of a critical strike.

name: Extra Threat
description: Extra threat is the amount of extra threat the character will generate whenever using an action. Each point of extra threat is equivalent to dealing 1% of the enemy's health in threat.

name: Threat Percentage
description: Threat percentage is the amount of bonus threat an action will generate based on a percentage of the original threat generated by the action.

name: Spell Damage Modifier
description: Spell damage modifier is flat damage added onto a spell action.

name: Spell Damage Percentage
description: Spell damage percentage is the amount of extra spell damage in percentage added to a spell action.

name: Physical Damage Modifier
description: Physical damage modifier is physical damage that is added to an action if the action deals at least 1 Physical damage.

name: Fire Damage Modifier
description: Fire damage modifier is fire damage that is added to an action if the action deals at least 1 Fire damage.

name: Frost Damage Modifier
description: Frost damage modifier is frost damage that is added to an action if the action deals at least 1 Frost damage.

name: Lightning Damage Modifier
description: Lightning damage modifier is lightning damage that is added to an action if the action deals at least 1 lightning damage.

name: Shadow Damage Modifier
description: Shadow damage modifier is shadow damage that is added to an action if the action deals at least 1 Shadow damage.

name: Light Damage Modifier
description: Light damage modifier is light damage that is added to an action if the action deals at least 1 Light damage.

name: Physical Armor
description: Physical armor reduces the amount of Physical damage this character takes by the specified amount. If armor is greater than the incoming damage, the character takes no damage.

name: Fire Armor
description: Fire armor reduces the amount of Fire damage this character takes by the specified amount. If armor is greater than the incoming damage, the character takes no damage.

name: Frost Armor
description: Frost armor reduces the amount of Frost damage this character takes by the specified amount. If armor is greater than the incoming damage, the character takes no damage.

name: Lightning Armor
description: Lightning armor reduces the amount of Lightning damage this character takes by the specified amount. If armor is greater than the incoming damage, the character takes no damage.

name: Shadow Armor
description: Shadow armor reduces the amount of Shadow damage this character takes by the specified amount. If armor is greater than the incoming damage, the character takes no damage.

name: Light Armor
description: Light armor reduces the amount of Light damage this character takes by the specified amount. If armor is greater than the incoming damage, the character takes no damage.

name: Physical Damage Percentage
description: Physical damage percentage is the percentage of extra Physical damage added onto an action that deals at least 1 Physical damage.

name: Fire Damage Percentage
description: Fire damage percentage is the percentage of extra Fire damage added onto an action that deals at least 1 Fire damage.

name: Frost Damage Percentage
description: Frost damage percentage is the percentage of extra Frost damage added onto an action that deals at least 1 Frost damage.

name: Lightning Damage Percentage
description: Lightning damage percentage is the percentage of extra Lightning damage added onto an action that deals at least 1 Lightning damage.

name: Shadow Damage Percentage
description: Shadow damage percentage is the percentage of extra Shadow damage added onto an action that deals at least 1 Shadow damage.

name: Light Damage Percentage
description: Light damage percentage is the percentage of extra Light damage added onto an action that deals at least 1 Light damage.

name: Physical Resistance
description: Physical resistance reduces the amount of Physical damage this character receives by the specified percentage. If the percentage is greater than 100%, the character will heal from Physical damage instead.

name: Fire Resistance
description: Fire resistance reduces the amount of Fire damage this character receives by the specified percentage. If the percentage is greater than 100%, the character will heal from Fire damage instead.

name: Frost Resistance
description: Frost resistance reduces the amount of Frost damage this character receives by the specified percentage. If the percentage is greater than 100%, the character will heal from Frost damage instead.

name: Lightning Resistance
description: Lightning resistance reduces the amount of Lightning damage this character receives by the specified percentage. If the percentage is greater than 100%, the character will heal from Lightning damage instead.

name: Shadow Resistance
description: Shadow resistance reduces the amount of Shadow damage this character receives by the specified percentage. If the percentage is greater than 100%, the character will heal from Shadow damage instead.

name: Light Resistance
description: Light resistance reduces the amount of Light damage this character receives by the specified percentage. If the percentage is greater than 100%, the character will heal from Light damage instead.
